definition: as before/(same) as usual/in the same manner/still/nevertheless
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: Behaviour that may be rational for individual actors can cause chaos if everyone copies it.
sentences.chinese: 个人合理的行为，若是每个人都照样做就会造成混乱。

sentences.english: The Sun Also Rises is a love story.
sentences.chinese: 太阳照样升起》是一部爱情小说。

sentences.english: Likewise you also have those who hold to the teaching of the Nicolaitans.
sentences.chinese: 你那里也有人照样服从了尼哥拉一党人的教训。

sentences.english: A black hen lays a white egg.
Could you deceive him as you might deceive men?
sentences.chinese: 人欺哄人，你们也要照样欺哄他吗？

sentences.english: Day didn't drop in my case, so bitter I mind, labor I bones and muscles.
sentences.chinese: 天没降大任于我，照样苦我心智，劳我筋骨。

sentences.english: James lived on without begging alms from others.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯没有向别人乞求周济照样过活。

sentences.english: You do not need to pester him. We can succeed without him.
sentences.chinese: 你不用死乞白赖地求他，没有他我们照样能成功。

sentences.english: And they sent also to the king of Moab, but he would not consent.
sentences.chinese: 又照样打发使者去见摩押王，他也不允准。

sentences.english: When they had done this, they caught a great number of fish and their nets were tearing.
sentences.chinese: 他们照样做了，网了许多鱼，网也几乎破裂了。

sentences.english: ' 'That is your sentence,' the king of Israel said.
sentences.chinese: 以色列王对他说，你自己定妥了，必照样判断你。

sentences.english: So also, the one with the two talents gained two more.
sentences.chinese: 那领二千的也照样另赚了二千。

sentences.english: Didn't expect so JiJie not gratified, and still not plans for the cover.
sentences.chinese: 没想到季洁照样不称心，而且还不计划拍封面了。

sentences.english: We can do without anyone who behaves so unprofessionally.
sentences.chinese: 不用表现得如此不职业的球员，我们照样可以比赛。

sentences.english: Poison is poison though it comes in a golden cup.
sentences.chinese: 即便装入金杯，毒药照样毒药。

sentences.english: Do the same with your vineyard and your olive grove.
sentences.chinese: 你的葡萄园和橄榄园也要照样办理。

definition: it'd be a wonder if... (following a verb phrase that is usually negative)
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
at the minimum/at the very least
fearless/not worried (by setbacks or difficulties)/even if/even though
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
